Package org.forgerock.openidm.smartevent.core

Class StatisticsHandler

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.smartevent.core.StatisticsHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.lmax.disruptor.EventHandler<DisruptorReferringEventEntry>, StatisticsHandlerMBean
public class StatisticsHandler extends Object implements com.lmax.disruptor.EventHandler<DisruptorReferringEventEntry>, StatisticsHandlerMBean
Event handler for monitoring and statistics Expects a single thread assigned to gather the statistics

    • setEventsEnabled

      public void setEventsEnabled(String eventName, boolean enabled)
      Description copied from interface: StatisticsHandlerMBean
      Set the enabled status for a given event name Disabling an event means no consumer will get notified
      Specified by:
      setEventsEnabled in interface StatisticsHandlerMBean
      Parameters:
      eventName - the event name in Stringified notation
      enabled - true to enable event processing, false to disable

    • getEventsEnabledMap

      public Map<String,Boolean> getEventsEnabledMap()
      Specified by:
      getEventsEnabledMap in interface StatisticsHandlerMBean
      Returns:
      A map from Stringified event name to its enabled status

    • setResultHistoryEnabled

      public void setResultHistoryEnabled(String eventName, boolean enabled)
      Description copied from interface: StatisticsHandlerMBean
      Set the result history enabled status for a given event name
      Specified by:
      setResultHistoryEnabled in interface StatisticsHandlerMBean
      Parameters:
      eventName - the event name in Stringified notation
      enabled - true to keep result details in the recent event history How long it is kept depends on the history size and the frequency of new events Caution should be exercised on events with large result objects as it will affect system memory consumption

    • getResultHistoryEnabledMap

      public Map<String,Boolean> getResultHistoryEnabledMap()
      Specified by:
      getResultHistoryEnabledMap in interface StatisticsHandlerMBean
      Returns:
      A map from Stringified event name to its result history enabled status
